en-UK.name: Beilu Memory
en-UK.description: Multi-file memory system with transient table and file index.
en-UK.description_markdown: **Beilu Memory** provides a three-layer memory architecture: transient table (injected every turn), file index (AI knows what's available), and detail files (read on demand). Supports ephemeral content.
